DataSource.Query: WITH sales_data AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY sales_amount DESC) AS row_number, * FROM ( SELECT inventory.verified_checkout_view.item_id, SUM(quantity) AS quantity, SUM((price * quantity) - COALESCE(discount, 0) + COALESCE(shipping_charge, 0)) AS sales_amount FROM inventory.verified_checkout_view WHERE inventory.verified_checkout_view.office_id = @OfficeId::integer AND inventory.verified_checkout_view.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND (COALESCE(@CostCenterId::integer, 0) = 0 OR inventory.verified_checkout_view.cost_center_id = @CostCenterId::integer) AND inventory.verified_checkout_view.book LIKE 'Sales%' GROUP BY inventory.verified_checkout_view.item_id ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10 ) re ) SELECT row_number, item_code, item_name, quantity, sales_amount FROM sales_data INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = sales_data.item_id;
